stimulusHtml: The graph of the function f, which has a domain of [0, 7] , is shown in the figure above. The graph consists of a quarter circle of radius 3 and a segment with slope -1. Let b be a positive number such that  âˆ« 0 b f ( x ) d x = 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4482@ .  What is the value of b?
choicesHtml: There is no such value of b.
